page.title: 07BRIGHTON & HOVE GOLF CLUB
page.content: The Brighton and Hove Golf Club was founded in 1887 and the old club house {MAP REFERENCE 269092,}was built in 1890.It is still in use today.See also photograph.At the moment,there are about 260 members who are mainly 40 years and older .There are only 9 holes on the course,but there are different tees (starting places)so you can go round twice.The green fees are Â£6 for 18 holes and Â£4 for 9 holes.For many years it was a club for gentlemen only but,in spite of some opposition, lady players were admitted after the 1939 war.Nowadays ladies are allowed to be full members.Although it has a genteel and old world atmosphere, the Club flourishes. Competitions and social events are held and many members attend the formal Sunday lunch which begins with Grace and ends with the loyal toast- and{Port!
